text: Tav kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, “Gumazamizir maba nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba iti, ezɨ gumazamizir igharaziba arazir aghuibagh ami.” Kɨ kamaghɨn nɨn akam ikaragham, “Nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikia egha arazir aghuibagh amir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn kɨ manmaghɨn nɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim gɨfogham? Kɨ arazir aghuibar amuam, eghtɨ arazir kabara nan nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nɨn akagham.”
